item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "If you want to get laid, go to college. If you want an education, go to the library." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
